name: Paul Johnston - current focus: moving electrons

content.html: So, my current time in government is over. Who knows when I'll go back? I'm going to have a break up to the new year, and see what happens next. The last year has been hard but I'm looking forward to what's next.
content.value:
So, my current time in government is over.

Who knows when I'll go back?

I'm going to have a break up to the new year, and see what happens next.

The last year has been hard but I'm looking forward to what's next.
